name: Shattered Generations
description:
Shattered Generations is a mobile RTS, inspired by Age of War. You fight an AI on an equal playing field while building your economy, training armies and upgrading your castle.

The current state of the game is WIP and the reason for uploading to itch.io is to get feedback. If you've got constructive feedback that would improve the game, please make a comment about it.

More info can be found on our website!
